source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_SEQ_00<tab>U'odh Nunh suspects his tribeswomen may have had a change of heart.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_SEQ_00<tab>忘れられたオアシスのウ・オド・ヌンは、冒険者にウ族の狩人たちと話をさせたいようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_SEQ_01<tab>U'odh Nunh suspects that your efforts on his tribe's behalf may have convinced the distrustful U to lend their strength to your cause. Speak with the huntresses once more to see if you have indeed earned their trust.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_SEQ_01<tab>忘れられたオアシスをまわり、改めてウ族の狩人たちから話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_SEQ_02<tab>The huntresses of the U have expressed a willingness to aid in quelling the beastman threat. Inform U'odh Nunh that his words have proven true.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_SEQ_02<tab>ウ族の狩人たちの話を聞いた。どうやら蛮族の牽制に協力してくれるようだ。忘れられたオアシスの「ウ・オド・ヌン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_SEQ_03<tab>His tribe won over by your deeds, U'odh Nunh formally pledges his aid to your cause. Return to the Waking Sands and inform Wigstan that your diplomatic mission was a success.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_SEQ_03<tab>ウ・オド・ヌンも、協力を約束してくれた。砂の家に戻り「ウィグスタン」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_SEQ_04<tab>Heartened by your success and the support of the U tribe, Wigstan has found a new sense of purpose. He vows to devote himself wholeheartedly to the suppression of the beastmen.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_SEQ_04<tab>ウィグスタンに報告した。彼は蛮族の抑止に向け、決意を新たにしたようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_TODO_02<tab>Report to Wigstan at the Waking Sands.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_TODO_02<tab>砂の家のウィグスタンに報告

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UODHNUN_000_000<tab>The U are a proud people. It is not easy for us to express gratitude─to outsiders most of all. But those you saved would speak to you. Do them the favor of hearing their words.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UODHNUN_000_000下のモンが、てめぇに礼を言いたいらしいぜ？
皆、感謝してるんだ。
面倒だとは思うが、皆の話を聞いてやってくれよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUA_000_010<tab>You gave me back my strength, and my honor. This is a kindness I must repay. Should you require my aid, you have it.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUA_000_010ウ族の者を助けてくれて、ありがと。
ウチラ、ウ族は、受けた恩義は忘れないわ。
蛮族の牽制とやらに協力するよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUA_000_015<tab>You gave me back my strength, and my honor. Should you require my aid, you have it.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUA_000_015ウチラ、ウ族は、受けた恩義は忘れないわ。
蛮族の牽制とやらに協力するよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUB_000_020<tab>I thought I was lizard grub for sure until you came to my rescue. What say we crack some lizard skulls together?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUB_000_020今回のアマルジャ族の蛮行……
私たちだけじゃ、力不足なこともあるんだねー。
みんなで協力して、がんばろっか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUB_000_025<tab>Just tell me where I can go to crrrack some lizard skulls!
target: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUB_000_025<tab>みんなで協力して、がんばろっか？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUC_000_030<tab>I don't know your Scions from a hole in the ground, but your friends are my friends, and your enemies are my enemies. Let us crush the beastmen together.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUC_000_030暁の血盟……とかいうのはよくわかんないけど、
あんたに協力する理由はできた。
一緒に、蛮族に対抗しようぜ……っと。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUC_000_035<tab>Your friends are my friends, your enemies are my enemies. Let us crush the lizardmen together.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUC_000_035あんたに協力する理由はできた。
一緒に、蛮族に対抗しようぜ……っと。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUD_000_040<tab>They told me you were strong, but now I have seen with my own eyes. I would be honored to do battle by your side.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUD_000_040冷静な行動、見事だったよ。
アナタがいうことは信用できそうだ。
アタシらウ族の民、アナタたちに協力をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUD_000_045<tab>You are not of us, yet I trust you as I would a fellow U. I would be honored to do battle by your side.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UZOKUD_000_045アナタがいうことは信用できそうだ。
アタシらウ族の民、アナタたちに協力をしよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UODHNUN_000_060<tab>I trust you have heard the answer you seek. The U do not open their hearts to outsiders easily, but those bonds we do form are that much the stronger.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UODHNUN_000_060ウ族のモンたちの答えは固まったようだな。
俺自身も今回の件で、アマルジャ族への対抗手段を、
増やすべきだと実感したぜ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UODHNUN_000_061<tab>To protect our freedom, and our newfound friends...the U will fight this battle.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UODHNUN_000_061……自由を守るためにゃ、
戦わなきゃならねぇときもあるってことだな。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UODHNUN_000_062<tab>Return and tell your Scion companions that the strength of the U is with them. Go in safety, and know that you will always be welcome here.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_UODHNUN_000_062お仲間に伝えてやってくれ。
蛮族の牽制に協力することを、ウ族の族長として約束すると。
いろいろ世話になっちまったな、またいつでも来いよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_WIGSTAN_000_080<tab>Friend, I had my doubts that even one of your talents could win over the U. Once again, you have proven yourself capable of tasks that would make an ordinary adventurer shrink in fear.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_WIGSTAN_000_080……そうかい、ウ族の協力を取り付けたんだね。
やっぱり、君は流石だな……。
その行動は、周りの人々に勇気をあたえるよ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_WIGSTAN_000_081<tab>You have given hope and courage to all here, myself most of all. Rest assured that we shall not squander the opportunity you have given us. For my comrades, for my realm, for a new dawn...I shall stand tall and fight.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC712_01024_WIGSTAN_000_081僕も仲間のため、「暁」のため……
エオルゼアの民のために立ち上がろう。
ウ族の民とともに、蛮族を抑えこんでみせるさ……。
